name: Rosita Melo
description: '''Clotilde Mela Rosa Luciano''', better known as '''Rosita Melo''' (July 9, 1897 â€“ August 12, 1981), was an [[Argentine]]-[[Uruguayan people|Uruguayan]] pianist, composer and poet. She is the author of the famous  ''[[vals criollo]]'' (Creole Waltz) ''"Desde el alma"'' for which she is known as the first widely recognized female [[Rioplatense Spanish|Rioplatense Hispanic]] composer in the world.
